content.text:
# Edward Semwanga

Edward Semwanga (or Eddie Ssemwanga) is a Uganda midfielder who played for Uganda in the 1978 African Cup of Nations.
External links
*[http://www.11v11.com/players/edward-semwanga-183679/ 11v11 profile]
